<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Order the given unit(s) to watch the given position or target (without radio messages). Use [[objNull]] as the target to order a unit to stop watching a position/target.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit(s) '''doWatch''' position </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit(s): [[Object]] or [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unit(s) '''doWatch''' target </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit(s): [[Object]] or [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> target: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldierOne '''doWatch''' [[markerPos]] "MarkerMoveOne"</code>

The unit named "soldierOne" will watch the position where the marker "MarkerMoveOne" is placed. </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_soldierOne '''doWatch''' _eastSoldier</code>

The unit named "soldierOne" will watch the unit named "eastSoldier". </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[commandWatch]], [[lookAt]], [[glanceAt]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
